briefTitle: Body Image and Psychosocial Functioning in Women With Breast Cancer: Can We Fix What We've Broken?
officialTitle: Randomized Control Trial of a Group Therapy Intervention Addressing Body Image and Psychosocial Functioning for Women With Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Self image and communication(using standardized instruments)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women with primary breast cancer
* age between 18 and 65 years
* completed adjuvant treatments
* Stage I,II,III cancer of the breast with no metastatic disease

Exclusion Criteria:

* presence of any metastases
* history of major psychiatric disorder as defined by the DSM-IV
* inability to speak or read English for questionnaire completion
* failure to provide informed consent
* currently participating in a therapist-led psychosocial support group
